vote.title: To Congratulate Robin Baradarvar as the 2025 George Meany Youth Services Award Recipient.
vote.description:
Title
 
To Congratulate Robin Baradarvar as the 2025 George Meany Youth Services Award Recipient.
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, the George Meany Awards Banquet, the largest labor recognition of its kind in the country, is a night for the Central Ohio AFL-CIO and the United Way Community Services Department to recognize local business and labor leaders who have given outstanding volunteer service to the community; and
 
WHEREAS, the George Meany Awards, named after the late George Meany, former President of the national AFL-CIO, are presented by the Central Ohio AFL-CIO to a labor person for outstanding leadership and support of health, welfare, and recreation services to the Central Ohio Community; and
 
WHEREAS, Robin Baradarvar is a 16-year-old junior at Centennial High School in the Columbus City Schools District; and
 
WHEREAS, Robin is an active member of the National Honor Society and participates in student leadership; and 
 
WHEREAS, Robin is deeply involved in his community, regularly volunteering at the Kaleidoscope Youth Center, the largest and longest-standing organization in Ohio solely dedicated to serving and supporting LGBTQIA+ youth. He served on KYC’s Summer Institute Program, and was a part of KYC’s Community Advisory Board in 2024; and 
 
WHEREAS, through these activities, Robin’s work uplifts youth and gives all people in the community an opportunity to develop crucial skills, build relationships, and thrive; now therefore,
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: 
That we hereby congratulate Robin Baradarvar as the 2025 George Meany Youth Services Award recipient.
